title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 572.7 - Notice of application incompletion and additional information request
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 572.7 - Notice of application incompletion and additional information request

State Regulations
(a) Within 15 days
after receipt of an application, the agency will advise the project sponsor by
certified mail whether or not the application is complete. If the application
is incomplete, the agency will provide a concise statement of the additional
information required. (b) A project
sponsor may appeal a determination that an application is incomplete, or the
contents of a request for additional information, under the procedures
specified in section
572.22
of these
regulations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
572.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
